snippet.title: Wagotabi - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🌟 Wishlist on steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2701720/Wagotabi
❤️ Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/wagotabi

=== Description ===

Embark on an immersive educational journey with Wagotabi, a game that teaches Japanese from scratch. Explore real Japanese prefectures, understand local culture, and dive into language immersion with a this unique learning tool!  

=== Links ===

🌐 Official website - https://www.wagotabi.com/home
🎟️ Free Beta Registration (some of you will be selected) - https://forms.gle/yeCJMwgNZtHq6Bcq5
📅 Stay informed about the release dates: https://11ae6920.sibforms.com/serve/MUIFAFx_s5cSsR5TpjxYO6LuJiNcGeQcfY2EU_D3xslyhxAoZupDAT07T14PZghx80IKDcZAgr3oRO64aD8KU6n1kV9zKTzxgNmPxIOU1ty2oPeT4h9hBdUNY8Enq4bKzZ-IBk-lPeaJEr7GgXNmyrJevTiaGXAUK7GEg73I_0Cg1_lErnVK-ohFbR2C2tiZ-IdHekB30P2keNL0

=== Credits ===

🎵 Music: Sakuya 2 by PeriTune (https://peritune.com/blog/2016/01/01/sakuya2/)

#Wagotabi #Japanese #LearnJapanese #Education #EdTech #Gaming #Indie
